name: mink
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small animal with valuable fur that is used to make expensive coats, or the fur from this animal: a mink coat

a small brown animal from Europe, North America, and Asia, or its fur, used to make expensive coats and other items of clothing: a mink coat
